item.description:
Passionate Data Scientist with 2 years of experience in academic and industrial fields as research assistants and interns respectively. Strong knowledge of statistical modeling (linear/logistic/ridge/Lasso regression) and machine learning (Clustering, Neural Networks). Solid in Python (NumPy, Pandas, sklearn, Selenium), R (tidyverse), and SQL. Rich hands-on experience in data manipulation and web scraping. Enjoy changes in the world and always be willing to learn new things.

Founder and maintainer of the “SCR” R package.
